LanguageData.RB_F_PDW.label: PDW Sub Machinegun
LanguageData.RB_F_PDW.description: The "Personal Defense Weapon" submachine gun. This small caliber firearm is compact and easy to handle, but lacks stopping power and range. Commonly used by Rabbie Imperial Forces as a sidearm.
